com.palantir.curatortestrule

Class LocalZooKeeperRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • com.palantir.curatortestrule.ZooKeeperRule
        • com.palantir.curatortestrule.LocalZooKeeperRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestRule

    public final class LocalZooKeeperRule
extends ZooKeeperRule
    A simple ZooKeeperRule that gets a ServerCnxnFactory from ZooKeeperRuleConfig on the port before running the statement, and shutdowns the ServerCnxnFactory after the statement.

    If port 0 is specified, then the port provided by the OS will be used. Therefore, multiple tests can bind to port 0 and a different server will be used for each.

    WARNING: behavior is unspecified if two LocalZooKeeperRules use the same non-0 port in parallel.
